#summary OpenPGM 2 : C Reference : pgm_shutdown()
#labels Phase-Implementation
#sidebar TOC2CReference

_Function_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/pgm.h>

int *pgm_shutdown* (void);
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
Shutdown OpenPGM internal machinery.

=== Return Value ===
On success, returns 0.  On failure, returns -1.
